snippet: Video coordinators must navigate the rules for exchanging game films that can turn their profession into an alchemy of dogged legwork of a detective and the backslapping of a car salesperson.
abstract: College football video coordinators have thankless job of essentially compiling a team's game plan each week based on game footage of opposing teams;  coordinators, responsible for collecting, vetting and organizing video footage,  must resort to sleuthing and ingenuity when opposing teams are uncooperative.
lead_paragraph: Video coordinators must navigate the rules for exchanging game films that can turn their profession into an alchemy of dogged legwork of a detective and the backslapping of a car salesperson.

headline.main: Playing Detective in Finding Films of Opponents
headline.print_headline: Playing Detective in Finding Films of Opponents
